About Me

Hello! My name is João Pereira and I am 24 years old. I'm currently living in Porto, Portugal. I have finished my Master's degree in Informatics and Computing Engineering at Faculdade de Engenharia da Universidade do Porto in the end of June, 2017. Since I was young, I always had a passion with technology and so I chose to involve this domain in my future life. Over time programming became a passion. Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Algorithms, Web and Mobile Development and also Computer Graphics are the areas that I'm usually involved cause these ones don't make me feel bored 😀


My favourite hobbies are playing videogames - yeah, i'm a gamer - at least I try to 😆, but I also love to see football games. Moreover, I really enjoy to go to the cinema, be with my friends and casually drink beer, so don't make excuses and let's drink someday 😎. Oh, I almost forgot, I'm a trully Anime and Manga passionate!


Well then, if you want to know more about me, feel free to contact me 😉
